name: Margarita
instructions:
Prep the glass: If you would like to garnish the rim of the glass, run a lime wedge around the rim, then dip the rim in salt or Tajin.

Combine the ingredients: Combine the tequila, lime juice, triple sec, and agave nectar in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into prepped glass and garnish with a lime slice.

name: Old Fashioned
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Combine ingredients: After a few minutes, toss out the ice in the glass and pour in the whiskey, simple syrup, and bitters. Add a large cube of ice or a few ice cubes and stir to dilute the mixture slightly.

Garnish and serve: Twist the orange peel to release the oils and flavors. Add the orange peel and a marschino cherry for garnish and serve.

name: Cosmopolitan
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Combine the ingredients: Combine the vodka, lime juice, triple sec, and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Toss out the ice in the prepped glass and strain the drink into it. Twist the orange peel to release the oils and flavors. Add the orange peel for garnish and serve.

name: Negroni
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Combine ingredients: After a few minutes, toss out the ice in the glass and pour in the gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth. Add a large cube of ice or a few ice cubes and stir to dilute the mixture slightly.

Garnish and serve: Twist the orange peel to release the oils and flavors. Add the orange peel and a marschino cherry for garnish and serve.

name: Moscow Mule
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the vodka and lime juice in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and top with ginger beer. Stir and serve. Garnish with lime wedge or some mint.

name: Martini
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Combine the ingredients: Combine the gin and dry vermouth in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Toss out the ice in the prepped glass and strain the drink into it and garnish with an olive.

name: Mojito
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the mint, lime juice, and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker. Then use a cocktail muddler to gently muddle the mint a bit to release the flavors. Then add the rum.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and top with club soda. Stir and serve. Garnish with lime wedge and some mint.

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Combine the ingredients: Combine the bourbon, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg light in a cocktail shaker.

Dry shake!: Seal the shaker and shake vigorously for 10 seconds without ice.

Shake again!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Toss out the ice in the prepped glass and strain the drink into it and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: French 75
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Combine the ingredients: Combine the gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Toss out the ice in the prepped glass, strain the drink into it, and top with champagne. Stir and serve. Twist the lemon peel to release the oils and flavors. Add the lemon peel for garnish and serve.

name: Manhattan
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Combine the ingredients: Combine the rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters in a cocktail shaker.

Stirred not shaken!:Add a few cubes of ice and stir for 20 seconds.

Strain and serve: Toss out the ice in the prepped glass and strain the drink into it and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Spritz Veneziano (Aperol Spritz)
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the prosecco, aperol, and club soda in a glass.

Stirred not shaken!:Add ice and stir for 20 seconds.

Garnish and serve: Add an orange slice for garnish and serve.

name: Gimlet
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Combine the ingredients: Combine the gin, lime juice, and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Toss out the ice in the prepped glass and strain the drink into it and garnish with a lime slice.

name: Sazerac
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Rinse with Absinthe Toss out the ice in the prepped glass and pour the absinthe inside of it. Swirl it around and then discard the liquid.

Combine the ingredients: Add the sugar cube and bitters and muddle it until the mixture becomes syrup-like, then add the rye whiskey and stir. nGarnish and serve: Twist the lemon peel over the drink to release the oils and flavors and set on rim as a garnish.

name: Pimm's Cup
instructions:
Prep the glass: Add a few cucumber, strawberry, orange and lemon slices so that it takes up about half the glass. Fill the last half off the cup with ice.

Combine the ingredients: Combine the Pimm's cup liqueur and ginger ale in a shaker.

Stirred not shaken!:Stir for 10 seconds to blend the ingredients.

Garnish and serve: Pour the drink into the glass and garnish with mint.

name: Mimosa
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Pour champagne and orange juice directly in the glass.

Garnish and serve: Garnish with orange slice.

name: Hurricane
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the light rum, dark rum, passion fruit juice, grenadine, lime juice, and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and garnish with an orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: White Russian
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the vodka and Kahlua in a glass.

Stirred not shaken!:Add ice and stir for 20 seconds.

Top it off and serve: Top it off with the heavy cream and serve.

name: Rosita
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Combine ingredients: After a few minutes, toss out the ice in the glass and pour in the tequila, Campari, dry vermouth, sweet vermouth, and bitters. Add a large cube of ice or a few ice cubes and stir to dilute the mixture slightly.

Garnish and serve: Twist the orange peel to release the oils and flavors. Add the orange peel for garnish and serve.

name: Gin Rickey
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Fill the glass with ice. Pour gin and lime juice directly in the glass.

Top off and serve: Top off with soda and serve. Garnish with a lime slice.

name: Paloma
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the tequila, grapefruit juice, lime juice, and agave nectar in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and top with grapefruit soda. Garnish with grapefruit slice.

name: Sidecar
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill. Combine the ingredients: Combine the brandy, Grand Marnier, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Toss out the ice in the prepped glass and strain the drink into it. Twist the orange peel over the drink to release the oils and flavors and set on rim as a garnish.

name: Mint Julep
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the mint and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker. Then use a cocktail muddler to gently muddle the mint a bit so release the flavors. Then add the bourbon.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh crushed ice to glass and strain drink into glass and garnish with mint.

name: Daiquiri
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Combine the ingredients: Combine the rum, lime juice and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Toss out the ice in the prepped glass and strain the drink into it and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Dark 'N Stormy
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Fill the glass with ice to the top and add the rum. Top off with ginger beer and stir for 10 seconds.

Garnish and serve: Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Cuba Libre
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Fill the glass with ice to the top and add the rum. Top off with coke and lime, then stir for 10 seconds.

Garnish and serve: Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Caipirinha
instructions: Combine the ingredients: Cut the lime in small pieces. Put the lime and brown sugar inside the glass and muddle until the mixture becomes syrup-like, then add the cachaça and stir. nGarnish and serve: Top with ice, stir, and garnish with lime wedges.

name: Tom Collins
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and top with club soda. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine all ingredients (except the coke) in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and top with coke. Stir and serve. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Gin Fizz
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Combine the ingredients: Combine the gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg light in a cocktail shaker.

Dry shake!: Seal the shaker and shake vigorously for 10 seconds without ice.

Shake again!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Toss out the ice in the prepped glass and strain the drink into it and top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Bramble
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Put the blackberries inside a cocktail shaker and muddle them until they become jam-like. Then add the gin, lemon juice, crème de mure, and simple syrup.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and garnish with blackberries.

name: Mai Tai
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the dark rum, orange curaçao, lime juice, and orgeat syrup in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and garnish with maraschino cherry and pineapple slice.

name: Amaretto Sour
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the amaretto liqueur, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and garnish with an orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: Whiskey Smash
instructions: Combine the ingredients: Cut a 1/4 of a lemon into small pieces. Put the lsmall emon pieces and sugar inside the glass and muddle until the mixture becomes syrup-like, then add the whiskey and stir. nGarnish and serve: Top with ice, stir, and garnish with lemon wedges and mint.

name: Tequila Sunrise
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Fill the cup to the top with ice. Pour tequila and orange juice directly in the glass. Then pour grenadine.

Garnish and serve: Garnish with maraschino cheery and an orange slice.

name: Grasshopper
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill. Combine the ingredients: Combine the crème de menthe, crème de cacao, and heavy cream in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Toss out the ice in the prepped glass and strain the drink into it and garnish with chocolate syrup.

name: Painkiller
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the dark rum, pineapple juice, orange juice, and cream of coconut in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and garnish with pineapple slice and nutmeg.

name: Sex on the Beach
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the vodka, crème de cassis, peach schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: Blue Hawaiian
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the light rum, blue curaçao, pinapple juice, and cream of coconut in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and garnish with a pineapple slice and maraschino cherry.

name: Bee's Knees
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Combine the ingredients: Combine the gin, lemon juice, and honey syrup in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Toss out the ice in the prepped glass and strain the drink into it. Twist the lemon peel over the drink to release the oils and flavors and set on rim as a garnish.

name: Americano
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Fill the glass with ice to the top and add the Campari and sweet vermouth. Top off with soda, then stir for 10 seconds.

Garnish and serve: Twist the orange peel over the drink to release the oils and flavors and use as a garnish.

name: Corpse Reviver No. 2
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Rinse with Absinthe Toss out the ice in the prepped glass and pour the absinthe inside of it. Swirl it around and then discard the liquid.

Combine the ingredients: Combine the gin, absinthe, Triple Sec/Cointreau (orange liqueur), Lillet blanc, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Strain the drink into the absinthe washed chilled glass.

name: Espresso Martini
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill. Combine the ingredients: Combine the espresso, vodka, Kahula, and crème de cacao in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Toss out the ice in the prepped glass and strain the drink into it and garnish with chocolate syrup.

name: Zombie
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and garnish with strawberry and mint.

name: Beachcomber
instructions:
Prep the glass: Fill the glass with ice and set aside to chill.

Combine the ingredients: Combine the light rum, orange liqueur, lime juice, and Luxardo in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Strain the drink into the absinthe washed chilled glass.

name: Rum Runner
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: Blue Hawaii
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge.

name: Piña Colada
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the light rum, cream of coconut, pineapple juice, and lime juice in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge.

name: Screwdriver
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the vodka and orange juice in a cocktail shaker.

Shake!:Add ice and shake vigorously until condensation forms on outside of shaker.

Strain and serve: Add fresh ice to glass and strain drink into glass and garnish with an orange wedge.

name: Irish Coffee
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Combine the hot coffee, whiskey, sugar and in a coffee mug.

Garnish and serve: Stir and garnish with whipped cream.

name: Bellini
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Pour prosecco and peach puree directly in the glass.

Garnish and serve: Garnish with peach slices.

name: Fuzzy Navel
instructions:
Combine the ingredients: Fill the glass with ice to the top and add the peach snapps and vodka. Stir for 10 seconds to blend the ingredients.

Garnish and serve: Garnish with an orange slice.
